medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began developing vague midline abdominal pain late yesterday evening, which has progressively worsened and localized to the right lower quadrant over approximately 20 hours. She reports subjective chills, nausea, and three episodes of vomiting, with anorexia and no oral intake since the previous evening.
medical_history.family_history: No history of colon cancer or gastrointestinal malignancies
